about_the_game:
Rug cleaning simulator is cozy, relaxing first person simulator about running small rug cleaning business.

✨ MEET UNIQUE CLIENTS & RUGS ✨

People you meet on street or in your store are procedurally generated. As a clients they will bring you completely different rugs with unique dirts to be cleaned.

✨ CLEANING ✨

Use your dedicated tools for specified cleaning stage. Indulge in some relaxing work. More you clean, more experience you get.

✨ CUSTOMISE YOUR STORE ✨

With money you earn and experience you get, buy new stuff & customise your store to attract more clients.

✨ UPGRADE YOUR TOOLS ✨

Upgrade your tools to get best performance & look. Gaining experience unlocks getting more performant machinery.
detailed_description:
Rug cleaning simulator is cozy, relaxing first person simulator about running small rug cleaning business.

✨ MEET UNIQUE CLIENTS & RUGS ✨

People you meet on street or in your store are procedurally generated. As a clients they will bring you completely different rugs with unique dirts to be cleaned.

✨ CLEANING ✨

Use your dedicated tools for specified cleaning stage. Indulge in some relaxing work. More you clean, more experience you get.

✨ CUSTOMISE YOUR STORE ✨

With money you earn and experience you get, buy new stuff & customise your store to attract more clients.

✨ UPGRADE YOUR TOOLS ✨

Upgrade your tools to get best performance & look. Gaining experience unlocks getting more performant machinery.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: modern Linux distribution
  • Processor: Quad-core processor (e.g., Intel i5-4th generation or equivalent AMD processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with Vulkan support (e.g., NVIDIA GTX 600 series / AMD Radeon HD 7000 series or newer)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: latest version of Linux distribution
  • Processor: Intel i7-7th generation or equivalent AMD Ryzen processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1000 series / AMD RX 500 series or newer
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: latest macOS
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM

name: Rug Cleaning Simulator

pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i7-7th generation or equivalent AMD Ryzen processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1000 series / AMD RX 500 series or newer
